page.title: 03Great Addington Manor.
page.content: The manor is a very big place and has lots of gardens,which are often open to the public.Opposite the Hare and Hounds public house there is a bench where the entrance to the Manor used to be. The coaches used to come in here. There used to be two big gates. The Manor used to have a swimming pool which was where the pond is now.The Manor house has lots of valuable paintings and antiques. Outside the house in one of the orchards are fruit trees,such as apple,pear,peach,plum and fig.There is a cage which has got strawberries and raspberries in.Parts of the house are older than others.The oldest part is dated 1610.In the house there is a big strong room where the plates and glasses are kept. The present owner is an elderly spinster in her mid-nineties.The village will be devastated by her death.
